TopicTitle: Reusable light SSTO and resupply vehicle

Articles.Content:
Once I managed to create a spaceplane that could reach orbit under its own power, I started tinkering with the design. At this point, it can do pretty much anything: raise its rear landing gear to taxi under its own power, fly unmanned, eject the cockpit in case of a crash, dock with a space station in orbit and carry a small payload or ion drive, either of which can be installed by the refuelling vehicle.

Here's a picture of the single-seater and the resupply vehicle.

And the two seater variant in orbit, with an ion drive installed.
